channel.title: Message System PLEASE HELP!
channel.description: I need help with an alternative pm system for me and my admins because when admins pm in my server it freezes their client. I was thinking something like this, ::PlayerName Message. I thought I had an idea on how to do it but it's confusing to me. How would I make it? Thanks in advance. :)

item.title: Message System PLEASE HELP!

item.description:

That might not be it actually. I’m doing it again and nothing’s coming up in the server window.

item.title: Message System PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It might be. I think this is the message I get in the server window when I pm someone. java.lang.NullPointerException at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:19736) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18866) at client.packetSending(client.java:18819) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:153) at server.main(server.java:53) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception

I thought it would be client sided because whenever I’m using the silab client and I message someone using the silab client, it will freeze the person’s client receiving the pm. But when I’m using the silab client and someone else is using another client, it won’t freeze them. And regular players can message regular players, mods, and admins. Then my mods can message players, mods, and admins. But my admins can’t message anybody or else it will freeze the person’s client they’re pming. It’s really weird. I’m using allstarscape source.

Read full topic

item.title: Message System PLEASE HELP!

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

How about we just try to help you fix pming?
Is in exception thrown in the server or client when they try to send a message?
